pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.11.1: For a discussion of my rendering of vā as “and”, see Appendix II: Technical Discussion of Individual Bhikkhunī Rules. For the rendering of saṅghāṭi as “robe”, see Appendix I: Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.33: The Pali actually reads “the eighth part”, rather than “the eight parts”. This, however, does not mean number eight in the list, but the last of the eight to be completed, whichever that is, and thus it implies the fulfillment of all eight.
